pullrequest.title: Word-wrapping in treeviews and item views, adapted from David Meyer's implementation.

content.raw:
No objections to shift\+enter: done.

I don’t think the navigation is different to before - the highlight moved previously as well, and as far as I can tell all the . Though is more obvious now, being a strong contrasting colour instead of just a mild semitransparent shading as before.

I found the extreme highlight pretty garish, especially since it obscures the colour coding that tells you whether there are errors or not and that sort of thing. So I’ve made more subtle - similar to how it looked in Windows before \(except now because this is custom it looks the same on all platforms - on linux it was garish before as well\).

I’m also not able to reproduce the “typing with the expansion column selected closes the tab” bug, so if you could confirm that is actually an issue still and maybe more precise steps for reproducing it if it doesn’t happen every time, then I’ll look into it more.

‌
